scripts.reset: npx knex migrate:rollback && npx knex migrate:latest && npx knex seed:run
scripts.staging: npx heroku run knex migrate:rollback -a device-management-staging && npx heroku run knex migrate:latest -a device-management-staging && npx heroku run knex seed:run -a device-management-staging
scripts.heroku: npx heroku run knex migrate:rollback -a device-management-system && npx heroku run knex migrate:latest -a device-management-system && npx heroku run knex seed:run -a device-management-system
